welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Banqiao, Taiwan! Get ready to experience the charming blend of traditional and modern cultures, delicious food, and lively atmosphere this city is famous for. Enjoy your stay and discover all that Banqiao has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

airports.airport_name: Taiwan Taoyuan International (Chiang Kai Shek International)

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Taiwan Taoyuan International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal of Taiwan Taoyuan International Airport, mainly serving international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
